testcase.classname: F01_Register | user can create new account
testcase.name: guest user could register with valid data successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user go to register page..............................................passed When user select gender type................................................passed And user enter first name "automation" and last name "tester"...............passed And user enter date of birth................................................passed And user enter email field "doaa@example.com"...............................passed And user fills Password fields "P@ssw0rd" "P@ssw0rd"........................passed And user clicks on register button..........................................passed Then success message is displayed...........................................passed

testcase.classname: F02 | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with email "doaa@example.com" and password "P@ssw0rd".......passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user login to the system successfully..................................passed

testcase.classname: F02 | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could not login with invalid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with email "invalid@example.com" and password "wrongP@ssw0rd".passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user could not login to the system.....................................passed

testcase.classname: F03_Currencies | user should be able to choose the currency he wants the product to be displayed in
testcase.name: user chooses euro currency from the list and price of products is changed to euro sign
testcase.system-out: When user choose euro from currencies list..................................passed Then the price of four products on home page is changed to euro.............passed

testcase.classname: F05 Hover on category | user should be able to choose sub-category by hovering on the main category and choose the sub-category

testcase.system-out: When user hovers on category and select subcategory.........................passed Then user is redirected to the subcategory page with title equals to subcategory value and url contains desktop.passed
